title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 91 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 91 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.
lineList.cn: 住在至高者隐密处的，必住在全能者的荫下。

lineList.en: I will say of the LORD, He is my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.
lineList.cn: 我要论到耶和华说，他是我的避难所，是我的山寨，是我的神，是我所倚靠的。

lineList.en: Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler, and from the noisome pestilence.
lineList.cn: 他必救你脱离捕鸟人的网罗，和毒害的瘟疫。

lineList.en: He shall cover thee with his feathers, and under his wings shalt thou trust: his truth shall be thy shield and buckler.
lineList.cn: 他必用自己的翎毛遮蔽你。你要投靠在他的翅膀底下。他的诚实，是大小的盾牌。

lineList.en: Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night; nor for the arrow that flieth by day;
lineList.cn: 你必不怕黑夜的惊骇，或是白日飞的箭。

lineList.en: Nor for the pestilence that walketh in darkness; nor for the destruction that wasteth at noonday.
lineList.cn: 也不怕黑夜行的瘟疫，或是午间灭人的毒病。

lineList.en: A thousand shall fall at thy side, and ten thousand at thy right hand; but it shall not come nigh thee.
lineList.cn: 虽有千人仆倒在你旁边，万人仆倒在你右边，这灾却不得临近你。

lineList.en: Only with thine eyes shalt thou behold and see the reward of the wicked.
lineList.cn: 你惟亲眼观看，见恶人遭报。

lineList.en: Because thou hast made the LORD, which is my refuge, even the most High, thy habitation;
lineList.cn: 耶和华是我的避难所。你已将至高者当你的居所。

lineList.en: There shall no evil befall thee, neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling.
lineList.cn: 祸患必不临到你，灾害也不挨近你的帐棚。

lineList.en: For he shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee in all thy ways.
lineList.cn: 因他要为你吩咐他的使者，在你行的一切道路上保护你。

lineList.en: They shall bear thee up in their hands, lest thou dash thy foot against a stone.
lineList.cn: 他们要用手托着你，免得你的脚碰在石头上。

lineList.en: Thou shalt tread upon the lion and adder: the young lion and the dragon shalt thou trample under feet.
lineList.cn: 你要踹在狮子和虺蛇的身上，践踏少壮狮子和大蛇。

lineList.en: Because he hath set his love upon me, therefore will I deliver him: I will set him on high, because he hath known my name.
lineList.cn: 神说，因为他专心爱我，我就搭救他。因为他知道我的名，我要把他安置在高处。

lineList.en: He shall call upon me, and I will answer him: I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver him, and honour him.
lineList.cn: 他若求告我，我就应允他。他在急难中，我要与他同在。我要搭救他，使他尊贵。

lineList.en: With long life will I satisfy him, and shew him my salvation.
lineList.cn: 我要使他足享长寿，将我的救恩显明给他。
